Text: CMC - on, IMU - on, SCS - on

Info: Optionally use V16 N91E to monitor the current shaft (.01 deg) and trunnion (.001 deg) angle in R1 and R2.
Press MARK REJ to reject a unsatisfactory mark
XX is the selected star code

XX is the selected star code
The difference of the angle between the 2 stars and the angle to between the 2 marks to check the marking quality. Allowable limits are +00011 for the SCT and +00003 for the SXT.
PRO to accept or key V32E to reject and bypass the next step.
